subject.name: Machine Learning
subject.description: Concepts of learning patterns from data, algorithm design and analysis, performance evaluation, and applications.
objectives: To learn the concept of how to learn patterns and concepts from data.
Design and analyze various machine learning algorithms and their applications.
Evaluate various factors of machine learning to measure performance.
Understand basic applications of machine learning in recent technological trends.

units.title: Statistical Decision Theory & Regression
topics: Bayesian Learning (ML, MAP, Bayes estimates, conjugate priors)

units.title: Hypothesis Testing, Ensembles & Clustering
topics: Clustering: K-means, K-medoids, density-based, hierarchical, spectral

suggested_books: Ethem Alpaydin - Introduction to Machine Learning (2nd ed)
J. Shavlik & T. Dietterich (Eds.) - Readings in Machine Learning
P. Langley - Elements of Machine Learning
Shai Shalev-Shwartz & Shai Ben-David - Understanding Machine Learning (2017)
T. Hastie, R. Tibshirani, J. Friedman - The Elements of Statistical Learning
